title: Beyond the sea (La Mer)
lyrics: Some where  be yond the sea Some where waiting for me My lover stands on golden sands And watches the ships that go sai--- ling Some where  be yond the sea She's there watching for me If I could fly like birds on high Then straight to her arms I'd go sai ling It's far  be yond the stars It's near beyond the moon I know  be yond a doubt My heart will lead me there soon We'll meet be yond the shore We'll kiss just as be fore Happy we'll be be yond the sea And never again I'd go sai ling
